Address.value: UNIT 03, 22/F,,WESTIN CENTRE, 26 HUNG TO ROAD, KWUN TONG, 999077, Hong Kong

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: CGTHK, the operating entity conducting substantially all of Creative Global Technology Holdings' business operations, was founded under the laws of Hong Kong in 2016. Since its formation, CGTHK has been engaged in the business of sourcing pre-owned consumer electronic devices (mainly smartphones, tablets, and laptops) from suppliers in the U.S., Japan, and some other developed countries, pursuant to the orders placed by wholesalers that will sell these goods in Southeast Asia and other areas. Although CGTHK has been expanding into the retail and leasing of consumer electronic devices business since 2021, the traditional wholesale of pre-owned electronic devices business still accounted for over 90% of CGTHK's revenue in 2022.
